response.original_title: To Live and Die in New Jersey
response.overview: Somewhere in New Jersey in the mid '80s, Sonny, Vinny, and Nico, three Italian American mobsters, meet in their hangout to discuss their next step after robbing a million dollars from a drug cartel. Suddenly, O'Brien, a cop from the NYPD, shows up unexpectedly to claim his share of the money. Sonny throws him an envelope with less cash than expected, and the situation turns sour.
response.title: To Live and Die in New Jersey
